Recipe.title: Hot Chocolate
Recipe.Note: Based on trick from Puerto Rico
Recipe.Description:
On Ransom's mission a member once made hot chocolate for him. He was shocked to see him adding Sugar along with the Chocolate Drink mix! But when he tasted it, he was sold.
Once home, Ransom played with ingredients, until he came up with this recipe. It has become so famous with the ward youth that he is asked to make it every time they have an outing where they get cold.

section.instruction: Place all ingredients in a saucepan.
Heat, stirring occasionally, until it is at the temperature you like.

Notes.note: Use the Evaporated Milk's can to measure the Water. It is exactly the right size.

Modifications.modification:
If you do not have Evaporated Milk, you can replace it with:
Plain Milk (Good, but not excellent)
⅛-¼ Cups Cream or Powdered Creamer (Very good, but not excellent.)

For an extra special treat, try one of the following:
Replace vanilla with ¼ teaspoon Almond Extract.
Add 1 Tablespoon Coconut Cream (Such as Coco Lopez. It is found by the alcohol "mixers".)
